main event: A white, derby hat-shaped UFO was observed hovering over a field in Warren County, New Jersey on March 6, 1957.
interesting points: The UFO was approximately 60-75 feet in diameter and hovered at an altitude of 200-300 feet.
The object emitted a shimmering ray or beam of light from the center of its underside.
Witnesses reported a low, growling or rumbling noise coming from the direction of the object.
Underneath the base of the object were continual displays of shimmering, wavery 'lines' or 'rays' that extended vertically almost to the ground.
The object suddenly accelerated and disappeared from sight.
